attributes.action: Ban overseas funding for the building and running of religious places of worship
attributes.background: Several overseas governments have banned overseas funding for the building and running of religious places of worship. We should too.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

It is not clear whether you want the UK Government to ban foreign aid being used to build and run places of worship in other countries, or if you want the UK Government to ban funding from overseas being used to build and run places of worship in the UK.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
